about_the_game:
Press the space bar to judge sensitive words

When you see a bullet screen containing sensitive words, just press the space bar. Of course, wrong judgments and missed judgments will reduce performance, so please be careful! (The game provides an intern mode, so you don’t have to worry about wrong judgments, just enjoy the game)

What? The following words and phrases all contain sensitive words?

"Tell me about your experience", "calcium oxide", "Louis XVI's laughing hole" and other seemingly harmless words actually contain sensitive words! ! ! ! Everyone is talking about ji, don't bring it, be civilized.

The rules have become very casual

The words that were not sensitive yesterday are sensitive today. New policy: ghost characters are not allowed. Don't let any ghost go.

Warm reminder

Friends who have not yet taken the college entrance examination, please play with caution, this game may have a negative impact on your Chinese level.

content_descriptors.notes: There will be some dirty words, violent language and pornographic terms that are easy to associate with the game, but there are no corresponding pictures. The game will touch on social hot issues such as school bullying, employment problems and the blocking of sensitive language words.

name: 望文爱生义

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win10
  • Processor: 都行吧应该
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 960m
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win10
  • Processor: 都行吧应该
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 都行吧应该
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: This is an auditor simulator game. You play as an ordinary auditor of the pen station. Check whether there are sensitive words in the live broadcast barrage. If there are sensitive words, press the space bar immediately to take them down. Omissions and misjudgments will deduct performance.
